Articles.Content:
Heyo! waterlubber here. I'm sure you all know me for my terrible puns and references to obscure 2006 cartoons. Anyway, here I am, doing a Jool 5 Mission! This mission is a simple, level-1 one-just to get my bearings. I'll be posting live as the mission progresses, or at least before doing something else. Here are the blueprints:

[http://imgur.com/a/i2VlJ](http://imgur.com/a/i2VlJ)

**Ã¢Å“â€œ** Success

**Ã¢â€ Âº** In Progress

**Ã¢Ëœâ€°** Let me sleep on it. Ã¢â„¢Â«

**Ã¢Å“â€”** Failed

**Ã¢ËœÂ**  Total Mission Failure.

Here's my mission plan:

1. **Ã¢Å“â€œ** Launch components to LKO.
2. **Ã¢Å“â€œ** Dock in LKO.
3. **Ã¢Å“â€œ** Kerbin-Jool transfer, mid-course plane change.
4. **Ã¢Å“â€œ** Jool retrothrust. Bring AP to intersect w./ Tylo.
5. **Ã¢Å“â€œ** Tylo circularization. [65km, 11m/s left! Wow!]
6. **Ã¢Å“â€œ** Tylo landing and return. Ditch Tylo Ascent Stage.
7. **Ã¢â€ Âº** Tylo-Bop transfer, with TVL.
8. Bop EVA Landing and return.
9. Bop-Pol transfer, with TVL.
10. Pol EVA Landing and return.
11. Pol-Tylo transfer and dock.
12. Tylo-Vall transfer, after refueling TVL.
13. Vall landing and return.
14. Dock in LVO.
15. Vall-Laythe transfer. Ditch TVL.
16. Laythe landing and ascent.
17. Return to craft. EVA into Kerbin Return Vehicle. Leave LAV somewhere.
18. Return to Kerbin.
19. Aerobrake to all hell.
20. Land.
21. There will be much rejoicing.
22. Realize how much of a waste of your life this was
23. Get report card
24. Stare at final grade, because Jool 5 is more important than comprehensive exams. (JK.)
25. Win.
